name: Gribouillis
description:
Third and last game of 2017 that I created at the University. The constraints were to do 2D platformer game with a character that can do a minimum of two actions (like jumping or attacking), have three different enemies with different patterns, two levels and a minimum of two collectible.

In Gribouillis you play as Gribouille, a little drawing made by a child on a piece of paper. The child who created you let you a path to follow and enemies to defeat. You can erase other objects and enemies and even draw some elements to help you in your path. 

Try to survive to get to the end of this funny and cute hand-drawn platformer game!
